translations: 靠近；与……邻接（abut 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: An earthquake hit the area abutting our province.
sentences.translation: 与我省邻接的地区遭受了一次地震。

sentences.sentence: The first entry maker of the allonge shall sign on the abutting edge.
sentences.translation: 粘单上的第一记载人，应当在汇票和粘单的粘接处签章。

sentences.sentence: At first it is two plates abutting each other or sliding past each other.
sentences.translation: 起初是两个板块相互连接在一起，或者彼此滑动过去。
